thread.title: Kathryn Warren
thread.title_full: Love Energy Savings reviewed by Kathryn Warren

author: Kathryn Warren
title: Kathryn Warren
text: I would highly recommend Love Energy to anyone - every member of staff I have ever spoken too there is more than helpful and very friendly. Especially Lee Cooke, he was very polite on the phone and gave me a courtesy call to make sure everything was running smoothly. A pleasure to deal with. Thank you
